title: (25616) Montgai - 12 Carrer del Calvari
description: Himalaya is a cozy area for campers located in the province of Lérida, it has beautiful facilities which consist of a terrace with views, a place accommodated for its visitors and parking for your vehicle which is allowed a maximum length of 6 meters, it also has services such as water, electricity and gas at no additional cost. And the most fun thing is that in the facilities there is a 4-walled recodrome with a gym, activities and showers! The price of accommodation is €5 per night. It should be noted that bike carrier services are offered. We hope to see you soon here camper. Regards, we add that in the summer facilities of the rocòdrom they are cool since the walls are made of 35, 40 cm stone, we will try to ensure that they are well cared for, thank you campers. On the weekend of August 18, 19, 20 in the Himalayas, the following activities will be carried out, indicated on the poster in the image gallery of our welcoming profile. To go to the facilities that weekend, it is necessary to register in advance by calling or contacting through Instagram

title: (25126) Almenar -
description: Place along a small gravel path between the fields, at an abandoned shed. Total tranquility and beautiful panorama. View of the Pyrenees in the distance. No shade, but that wasn't a problem now, in October. Just nature sounds. Fragrance of wild thym. Between 6 p.m. and 12 noon the following afternoon, no one was seen or heard. Very clean. Keep it that way! Reasonably accessible via a forest road with some potholes, but doable without a 4x4.

title: (25222) Sidamon - Autovia del Nord-Est
description: Small service area with gas station, restaurant, small play area with some picnic tables. Large parking lot with some shadows.

title: (25331) Tornabous - 12 Carrer Ronda del Nord
description: Parking of the Parc del Reguer, a park with grass, picnic tables and great playgrounds next to the Reguer stream. By bike or walking from there, there are less than 2 km to the Iberian town Molí del Espígol, very cool to see, on a path full of pear trees. Nearby, if you look out over the Agramunt road, you will see a huge tree among the pear trees, on the left side, it is the banana tree declared by the Generalitat as monumental of Tornabousde, 4 m in diameter from its trail. It is also mandatory to go to the social bar of the old cinema that still works, being one of the 43 that are open in Spain with a theater. In homage to his 75th birthday at C 53 you will see the mural and next to it, recommended fruit from km0.

title: (25310) Agramunt - 20 Carretera de Tàrrega
description: Very large dirt parking with a car workshop and tire replacement, it is next to the road, there is a gas station on the spot, and a bakery nearby! you could spend the night without problem, they leave many trucks parked overnight!

title: (25310) Agramunt - 14 Carrer Camí de les Planes
title_short: (25310) Agramunt - 14 Carrer Camí de les Planes
description: Picnic area with benches and tables. Garden area next to the river Sió, in Agramunt. Forbidden to spend the night

title: (25005) Lleida - 4 Carrer de Sabadell
description: Laundry with Consum supermarket next door with outdoor parking. Playground and cafeterias.

title: (25310) Agramunt - 4 Placa Fondandana
description: The tourist office will indicate that it was the best place to sleep

title: (25310) Agramunt - 5c Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Low cost laundry area with plenty of parking nearby to park, there is also a park for children to play near the site and a pastry shop right in front

title: (25615) La Baronia de Sant Oïsme - C-12
title_short: (25615) La Baronia de Sant Oïsme - C-12

Good good.
A quiet place, easy access, flat and good views.

title_short: (25005) Lleida - 91 Carrer de les Corts Catalanes
description: LAVANDA self-service laundry, near market parking or there is also usually parking in the streets around.

title: (25310) Agramunt - 26 Plaça del Pou
description: Parking within Agramunt. No service. Very spacious.

title: (25005) Lleida - 17 Partida Balàfia
description: Along the whole Avenue it is possible to park and spend the night, somewhat inclined in what areas but in general comfortable, quiet and spacious.

title: (25691) Àger - 10 C-12
description: Small parking lot at the entrance of the city.

title: (25691) Àger - 23 Carrer Enginyer Cabezas
description: Open and quiet place. Little services but nice

title: (25691) Ager - 16 C-12
description: New parking enabled. Ideal for visiting the town and going on excursions. The entrance is sloping, be careful the lowest Ac. It is dirt and fairly flat. It is almost opposite the campsite. At night good vision of the stars for being near Montsec.

name: Camping Las Planas
title: (22571) Camping Las Planas
description: Very nice small campsite, well maintained and quiet, 2 km from the village. Open from April to September. The pool and bar are only open in summer. It is reached by a winding road, so it is good to call before to check availability. The reception opens from 15:00.

title: (25001) Lleida - Avinguda de Victoriano Muñoz
description: Public parking near downtown: less than 5 minutes walk. Two entries. View of the cable-stayed bridge and the storks. Along the railway, limited noise.  No service.

title: (25317) La Donzell - 2 Carrer de l'Empedrat
description: Medieval walled town, very quiet, in the hermitage we find a picnic area, with water, perfect for walking or cycling routes, full of tracks that take us to villages and houses, some abandoned, in the middle of nature surrounded by oak trees and cereal cultivation, in beautiful spring, from there we can visit Agramunt, there is a track from La Donzell to Agramunt of 5 km. Ideal by bike, walking a 50-minute walk, in Agramunt there is the Vicens turron factory, a Roman church worth visiting and porch streets.

name: Camping Vall d'Àger
title: (25691) Camping Vall d'Àger
description: Nice place with large parking spaces between trees. The shower and toilet house is well-kept and up-to-date. Electricity is also available at all seats for a surcharge.

title: (25001) Lleida - Avinguda de Victoriano Muñoz
description: Perfect to be a couple of days or more, 5 minutes walk from the main shopping street of Lleida (Carrer Major), 10 from the elevator to go up to the Seu Vella (Plaça Sant Joan) quiet at night

title: (25001) Lleida - 31 Carretera Nacional II
description: Gas station with free water and gas. There are bathrooms asking for the key. Behind is a laundry room.

title: (25008) Lleida - 7 Carrer Folch i Torres
description: Laundry with 4 washers and 3 dryers

title: (25310) Agramunt - 15A Raval de Sant Francesc
description: Vanwoow territory

title: (25615) Camarasa - 5 C-13
description: A few steps from the road, at an entrance on hi, there is an antic tancat restaurant and a container area visible from the road. Hi there are two picnic tables with benches, partially in the shade.

title: (25691) Àger - C-12
description: Small parking lot for overnight, without service

Quiet place, long dirt track in perfect condition, somewhat broken access to the parking lot (20 meters).
only small vans.

title: (25317) Agramunt - 40 Partida Cami Doncell
description: Two barbecues, a large stone table, children's play area ... an ideal place to rest ... pets are allowed

title: (25310) Agramunt - Unnamed Road
description: Parking day and night. Very quiet, silent.

title: (25250) Bellpuig - 62 Avinguda de les Garrigues
description: Polisportiu. Sports area with ample parking. Pool in summer with access to showers. Restrooms in the sports hall during daytime hours. The visit of the Church (Mausoleum) and the convent is recommended.

title: (25004) Lleida - 1 Plaça Hispanoamèrica
description: Seu Vella car park. Accessible free of charge during the day, ideal for visiting the castle and the Seu Vella as well as the surrounding streets. Please note: accessible only to vehicles less than 2m wide (passage under a narrow arch to access the car park). Passes without problem with a van or car.

title: (25250) Bellpuig - 35 Carreró del Call
description: The parking lot is on the street, the special thing is the “Bar Restaurant com a casa” restaurant. The best food I have ever eaten in Spain. It looks inconspicuous but the chef and his wife are so nice and the food is excellent. We had a baguette (very big) and tapas bravas and tapas champions and it was so good! Really awesome! The carrot cake was also the best we've ever had! And all at an unbeatable price!

title: (25006) Lleida - 13 Carrer dels Pirineus
description: Residential car park with water point nearby

title: (25001) Lleida - 6 Avinguda de València
description:
Clean & Go Laundry

clean and efficient place

title: (25199) Lleida - 13 Carrer Periodista Trapa

title: (25250) Bellpuig - 36 Carrer la Font
description: A nice spot in the grounds of a monastery. Abundant trees, picnic area and barbecues.

title: (25250) Bellpuig - Camí del Molí
description: Park of the convent. Picnic tables. Ample space for the night next to the marsh. Do not enter the vehicle in the barbeque area

title: (22571) Baldellou - Unnamed Road
description: Place really quiet surrounded by mountains. The Lake is very close but it is very difficult to reach with large vehicles since the roads are very narrow with low trees. Sure you can reach the shore for the night but we didn't dare with some roads. If someone you get to please indicate it.

title: (25001) Lleida - 4 Carrer de Binèfar
description: Good place to park and visit the city, direct buses serve the city center every 10 minutes. To spend the night it is a quiet residential area and to do some shopping before continuing the road

title: (25199) Lleida - 8 Partida Vallcalent
description: Very quiet place to spend the night, next to the prison and the fire station.

title: (25739) Artesa de Segre - 9 L-512
description: Only water, we fill our bottles suddenly

title: (25110) Alpicat - 141 Carrer Mossèn Cinto Verdaguer
description: Parking next to a park, and near the soccer field. Very flat and quite quiet. Bakery at 5min, bar, bazaar, pharmacy, tobacconist, sports center with swimming pool, etc. Pets cannot be in the grass / park area, yes in the parking lot

title: (25001) Lleida - 1 Avinguda de Miquel Batllori
description: Parking lot less busy than that of the university

title: (25250) Bellpuig -
description: A few places at the edge of a pond. Very quiet to spend the night

title: (25110) Alpicat - 133 Carrer de Lleida
description: Cepsa gas station with automatic laundry, 50 meters from the slat bonpreu supermarket with low cost gas station. In the back area parking trucks. Nearby shops about 200 meters away, a town with garden areas and municipal swimming pools, with an esplanade in front to park or spend the night without problems. At the entrance of the car-cleaning town, with 1 open box to clean motorhomes without problems.

title: (25140) Arbeca - Unnamed Road
description: Hermitage of St. Miquel de les Borgetes. Picnic area with barbecues.

title: (25198) Lleida - 39 Partida Peixa Som. Mes

title: (25001) Lleida - Camí Copa d'Or

title: (25110) - 49I Cami Vell
description: Good place to spend the night. Quiet area 10 minutes walking from the town of Alpicat. It is not enabled as an area for motorhomes. Picnic area and source of drinking water. Next to the JCA and Karting cinemas.

title: (25198) Lleida - Carretera de Tarragona
description: Picnic area without table, with barbecues and shade, far from Lleida, I only stopped several times to eat and take a nap, so as not to spend the night. I did not see any prohibition signs. There are always enough people to picnic.

title: (25001) Lleida - 27 Avinguda de Barcelona
description: Parking at 5 ”center, it is university parking, in highly demanded classes

title: (25002) Lleida - 8 Carrer Isaac Albéniz
description: Drinking water well, hardly to not chlorinated. Not directly accessible with Womo, as it is on the sidewalk.

title: (25430) Juneda -
description: EcoCentre Les Obagues. Educational space with ample parking to spend the night. Access to the bathroom, WC and cafe. You can visit the region, the animals, etc. 500 meters from the town of Juneda and 20 km from Lleida Call ahead to book parking

title: (25194) Lleida - N-2
description: Place to spend the night just outside the city, next to the river, despite the bridge right next to it, it is quite quiet.

title: (25250) Bellpuig - Unnamed Road
description: Bellpuig motorcycle circuit parking. There are no services, but very spacious to spend the night if you are on the road.

title: (25330) Vilagrassa - Unnamed Road
description: Circuit de Montperler. Bellpuig. Ample parking. Fountain at the roundabout.

title: (22589) Canelles - Unnamed Road
description: We went looking for the Canelles dam but access to it was cut off due to construction work, we decided to continue down the hill and we found a very quiet shadow in a grove of trees touching the river where the Santa Ana reservoir begins. We only spent 5h eating, resting, playing with the pekes. Good views contemplating the flight of vultures. Very calm, if they open the tunnel soon and we can go up where the canelles ends.

title: (25194) Lleida -
description: Large parking lot for a few hundred vehicles, unpaved.

title: (25691) Ager -
description: The fountain is broken, there is a small artificial pond, departure for excursions to the Mare de Deu de Pedra hermitage

title: (25198) Alpicat - 100 Partida Plá de Monsó
description: Free restaurant parking 24h, with gas station, truck parking and free wifi in the restaurant.

title: (22572) Castillonroy - 3 Cañada Alfarràs
description: Street parking next to the town hall there is a square with a fountain and a very quiet and cozy playground.

title: (25318) Les Puelles - 11 Diseminado les Puelles
description: Place to park and see the Castle of Les Puelles. There are nice trails and a large raft with orchards behind the very cool castle. For the overnight we recommend doing it at the Hipica Obrint Camí a few meters away and accessible with large motorhomes.

title: (25430) Juneda - 6 Carrer del Canal d'Urgell
description: Juneda sports area car park, right next to the Urgell canal. Quiet and perfect place to spend a night, make excursions by bike or on foot along the canal and a short visit to the town with a medieval past.

title: (25691) Àger -
description: Good site for several vehicles, even on the road that is wide. Access road to the hermitage of the Virgen de Piedra.
